About

Me

Hello, I'm Melody

I dedicate myself to crafting eye-catching websites with a strong attention to the way users interact with them. I stand for building meaningful and engaging digital experiences accessible to all, making a point of developping layouts that will adapt to different type of media, whether it's a desktop monitor, a tablet or mobile phone.

Coming from a different career path, my skills are quite varied, including illustration : whether it's a set of icons, a character or a full environment, anything is possible.
